items.name: Lumina Art Centre
items.short_description: A vibrant hub for contemporary African art, featuring rotating exhibitions and interactive installations from emerging and established artists.
items.address: Plot 105, Femi Oye Street, Utako, Abuja

items.name: The Spice Route Market & Eatery
items.short_description: An immersive culinary journey offering a diverse range of local and international street food, gourmet groceries, and unique dining experiences under one roof.
items.address: Plot 21, Adetokunbo Ademola Crescent, Wuse II, Abuja

items.name: Zenith Adventure Park
items.short_description: Abuja's newest indoor family entertainment destination, featuring a trampoline park, virtual reality arcade, laser tag arena, and a dedicated kids' play zone.

items.name: The Green Sanctuary Gardens
items.short_description: A serene urban oasis focused on indigenous flora and fauna, offering guided nature walks, birdwatching spots, and sustainable living workshops.
items.address: Off Apo-Giri Road, Behind Gudu District, Abuja

items.name: Opulence Grand Cinemas
items.short_description: Redefining movie-going with state-of-the-art screens, recliner seating, private screening rooms, and an exclusive lounge serving gourmet food and drinks.

items.name: The Skyline Lounge
items.short_description: Enjoy breathtaking panoramic views of Abuja's skyline while sipping on artisanal cocktails and indulging in delectable bites at this chic rooftop destination.
items.address: Transcorp Hilton Abuja Rooftop, Aguiyi Ironsi Street, Maitama, Abuja

items.name: Nexus Innovation Hub & Cafe
items.short_description: A collaborative space fostering technology, entrepreneurship, and creativity, featuring co-working areas, event spaces, and a public-facing modern cafe.

items.name: The Monarch Suites & Gallery
items.short_description: An exclusive boutique hotel renowned for its unique design, showcasing local art, and offering public access to its award-winning restaurant and serene infinity pool.
items.address: Olusegun Obasanjo Way, Guzape District, Abuja

items.name: Summit Eco-Park & Adventures
items.short_description: An outdoor adventure park offering ziplining, rock climbing, obstacle courses, and guided bike trails amidst Abuja's natural landscapes, perfect for thrill-seekers.
items.address: Near Kado Fish Market, Off Airport Road, Abuja

items.name: Kulture Kiln Collective
items.short_description: A modern take on a crafts village, showcasing artisan workshops, handcrafted goods, live cultural performances, and a contemporary Nigerian cuisine cafe.
items.address: Behind National Mosque, Area 10, Garki, Abuja
